messages.subject: Homeschooling Co-op
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks, I m part of a group of mostly homeschoolers with a curriculum, mostly a Christian curriculum.  I do unschooling or I often say child led learning or
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks,

I'm part of a group of mostly homeschoolers with a curriculum, mostly a
Christian curriculum. I do unschooling or I often say child led
learning or interest based and we are a mixed religious home. One of
my homeschooling friends has used Oakmeadow and is a bit more flexible,
we'll be getting together to do things. We do have a co-op. The
classes are segragrated somewhat by age. They are K-3rd and 4th grade
on up. The break down is somewhat flexible. Also my son who is 6
wanted to do the older class and I just came with him. I taught the
are classes and it was a group of 10 K-3 boys which had included one 3rd
grade girl and we put her in the next group. We will be planning our
next set of classes in two weeks.

Sherry from Upper Michigan in a community of 20,000.
